page.title: 17CUSTOMS-GOTHAM TALES
page.content: Another tale is the story about the cheeses.The tale begins when a man from Gotham was riding home for his dinner when he saw a large yellow cheese which had fallen off a cart which had been on the way to market.He was so hungry that he decided to ride to Gotham to the swordsmith to get a longer sword than his own in order to reach the cheese.Although the sword was longer it still didn't reach the cheese. Just then another man came who was very hungry.He asked the first man why he didn't get off his horse to pick up the cheese.As he spoke,he dismounted, picked up the cheese and rode off. "What a good idea,"thought the first man as the other man rode off with the cheese.
